Text:
Actually , adobe's free reader works perfectly fine, the only thing is when you swipe to advance you are actually advancing in the opposite direction.
You can also read it on your PC.

Acknowledgment: the images used to make the pdf have been extracted from Hamdy Ghanems popular android app. However , I found reading from his app difficult, and his update disabled some features. Also I imagine this pdf would have wider platform support (PC, Mac, etc) hence I decided to convert his images into an easy to use pdf. Enjoy.

Thanks for the upload. And pardon my ignorance, I have an Android cell, but no data plan, can I still use apps? I'm looking for an App that translates Spanish and English but I'm hoping with enough memory, I won't need to hook up to the Internet.
